#summary Special functions

== Special Functions ==

Special functions benefit from compiler magic

 * Abs 
 * Assert
 * Assigned
 * [SpecialConditionalDefined ConditionalDefined()], checks if symbol is defined at runtime
 * Dec
 * Declared
 * [SpecialDefined Defined()], checks if a symbol is defined (at compile time) or if an expression is defined
 * High
 * Inc
 * Length
 * Low
 * Ord
 * Pred
 * SizeOf
 * Sqr
 * Succ
